amendment.description: Amendment to report language encouraging the use of geosynthetic materials and other innovative technologies.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 8 printed in Part B of House Report 114-325 to report language encouraging the use of geosynthetic materials and other innovative technologies.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Fleischmann amendment (A008) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment (A008) offered by Mr. Fleischmann to the Rules amendment (A001).
